claim_card.claim: On the same morphology-sensitive diagnostics (D1_L2 and Z_mf), the observed cohort remains comparatively close to the ΛCDM reconstruction cohort while remaining far from the Gaussian synthetic controls.
claim_card.test_hook: Compare observed, Gaussian, and ΛCDM cohort summaries for D1_L2 and Z_mf; verify the qualitative ranking Observed ≈ ΛCDM and both far from Gaussian.

source.locator: p1 Abstract; p3 (role of ΛCDM cohort); p5–8 Results; Table 1 (p7)
source.note: Structured-reference cohort comparison supports morphology-sensitive interpretation
